mapper.insert: INSERT INTO youchat.group_chat(user_group_id, send_time, content) VALUES (#{userGroupId}, NOW(), #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT gc.id, gc.user_group_id, gc.send_time, gc.content, ug.user_id, ug.group_id FROM youchat.group_chat gc LEFT JOIN youchat.user_group ug ON gc.user_group_id = ug.id UNION SELECT gc2.id, gc2.user_group_id, gc2.send_time, gc2.content, ug3.user_id, ug3.group_id FROM youchat.group_chat gc1 RIGHT JOIN youchat.user_group ug1 ON gc1.user_group_id = ug1.id RIGHT JOIN youchat.user_group ug2 ON ug1.group_id = ug2.group_id RIGHT JOIN youchat.user u ON ug2.user_id = u.id RIGHT JOIN youchat.user_group ug3 ON ug3.group_id = ug1.group_id AND ug3.user_id = u.id RIGHT JOIN youchat.group_chat gc2 ON gc2.user_group_id = ug3.id ORDER BY send_time
